import { useState, useEffect, React } from "react"; import "./details.css"; import video from "../.././Assets/sample.mp4"; import axios from "axios"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; const Details = (props) => { let { tokenId } = useParams(); const [media, setMedia] = useState(""); const [price, setPrice] = useState(0); const [title, setTitle] = useState(""); const [description, setDescription] = useState(""); const [tokenData, setTokenData] = useState({}); useEffect(async () => { const uri = await axios.get(`http://localhost:8080/getTokenURI`, { params: { tokenId: tokenId }, }); console.log(uri.data.result); const price = await axios.get(`http://localhost:8080/getTokenPrice`, { params: { tokenId: tokenId }, }); const uriResponse = await axios.get(uri.data.result); setTokenData({ ...uriResponse.data, price: price.data.result }) let owner = localStorage.getItem("walletAddress"); console.log(owner); let buttonHandler = ()=>{ } },[]); console.log(tokenData); return (
